title: Beautiful Townhome-style Condo on Top of the Hill
map_address: 4th AVE W near W Garfield ST
posting_body: Enjoy life at the top!

Beautiful condo (one of four) in a classic QA house perfectly located atop Queen Anne Hill near the Queen Anne Library, Queen Anne Community Center and Pool, Trader Joe's, coffee houses, Queen Anne Avenue shops, and the park.
Quiet street.
Walk everywhere you want to be.
The kitchen, living/dining, and one bedroom (14' by 15') are on the main floor (2nd floor).
The bedroom upstairs (3rd floor) is a larger space that covers the entire top of the house.
It is irregular shaped with sloped ceilings and plenty of natural light from 3 skylights!
The stairs come up into the center of the room, so it divides the room into 3 areas.
Near 1200 sq ft altogether.
One newly remodeled bathroom with an oversized claw foot tub.
Refinished hardwood floors everywhere.
New gas cooktop.
Washer/dryer in unit.
Private deck and off-alley parking space with plenty of street parking too.
Available to lease on September 1 (one year), maybe a day or two before.
Water, sewer, and garbage are included in the rent.
You pay for gas, electricity, and communication.
As noted below, no pets.
No smoking.
Remodeling is still underway.
Updated pictures of the bath and kitchen coming soon.
Showings begin on August 10.
Unit availability, pricing and terms are subject to change.
Application link will be provided following a virtual or in-person tour and agreement to terms.
More info:
> Premium location on a quiet street on the top of Queen Anne hill.
> Extremely well maintained 4-unit building and a yard.
> West-facing balcony, one off-alley parking spot.
Long-term owners in the building.
>The main level (on the second floor) contains a large bedroom with an oversized sliding pocket door, a bay window with a seating bench, and a closet.
Also on the main floor are the living/dining room, bathroom, kitchen, and west-facing balcony.
The Upper level contains an open large space with plenty of natural light and 3 skylights.
> Minisplit installation for cooling is under contract, expected later in the year ready for next summer.

> Bathroom remodel includes a clawfoot bathtub with all new plumbing, new toilet, sink faucet, new Marmoleum flooring, side-by-side washer and dryer with above counter space, large window, and storage cabinets.
New flooring in the bathroom and kitchen.
> Remodeled kitchen contains new stainless steel refrigerator, dishwasher, and range hood.
> Common entry foyer and stairs to all units.
